title: Festival Summer
description: The Magnificent Milford was one of the great families of England playerstheatrical... all bright, attractive and ingenious... except for theyoungest, Katrine, quiet, homely and without the slightest desire to make acareer in the theater. When the clan broke the trip to participate in theCantwich Festival, she accepted, on condition that her only role would bedirector Max Neilson's secretary and assistant. But he had other plans."Me--act? Act professionally?" Katrine stared at Max Neilson unbelievingly."You can't be serious!"But he was. None of her protestations changed his belief. And he called hera coward. Well, maybe she was, Katrine thought. She'd always been content to shun the limelight that surrounded her famous family. Now, thanks to Max,she wasn't happy in her Cinderella corner!
author: Charlotte Lamb
